name: Accuracy Reduction and Evasion
flavor: Got a little bit of dirt in your eye?
text:
- Characters with Accuracy Stat Changes roll the same number of Accuracy Dice and add or subtract successes accordingly (subject to the standard +/-3 limit to stat changes).
- Evasion Stat changes on the User confers a similar bonus/penalty for Foes targeting the character. Foes targeting a character with a positive Evasion Stat Change subtract successes from their accuracy roll (or adds successes if the target has a negative Evasion Stat Change).
- Characters with positive Evasion Stat Changes may spend 1 point to perform the Dodge action against an incoming move.
